Articles.Content: I see a lot of people mention \'infinite fuel tanks\', and I\'d like to use them. How do acquire them? I believe you have to edit the game properties, but I don\'t know what to do.

I\'m no expert, but I think you can just set the burn rate of your engines to 0.

Try going to your KSP folder, then look in the Parts folder. Find the engine you want to use and either copy the folder and rename everything, or you can just edit the parts.cfg and set fuelConsumption to 0.
Windows can\'t open that file type, so what now?
Notepad can edit the .cfg files used by KSP, so just tell windows to use Notepad to open them, never use Wordpad though, it\'ll ruin the file.

Awesome, I\'ll do that now. I\'ll edit this with the results

*EDIT* Huzzah, it works! 8) to the Mun! This is the best forum ever, so many helpful people
